title: Rebecca
description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his spectral first wife's haunting presence.

title: The Great Dictator
description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
description: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land during the Great Depression and travels to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless.

title: Pinocchio
oscars_won_details: Best Original Song (When You Wish Upon a Star)
description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

title: The Philadelphia Story
description: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

title: Fantasia
oscars_won_details: Honorary Award (To Walt Disney, William Garity, John N. A. Hawkins, and the RCA Manufacturing Company)
Honorary Award (To Leopold Stokowski and his associates)
description: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

title: His Girl Friday
description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: The Shop Around the Corner
description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

title: The Thief of Bagdad
description: After being tricked and cast out of Bagdad by the evil Jaffar, King Ahmad joins forces with a thief named Abu to reclaim his throne.

title: The Letter
description: The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

title: The Bank Dick
description: A drunk is hired to replace a bank guard he accidentally knocked out.

title: Foreign Correspondent
description: On the eve of WWII, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

title: The Mark of Zorro
description: A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.

title: The Sea Hawk
description: Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for the attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills on the sword.

title: My Favorite Wife
description: A woman, missing for seven years and declared legally dead, returns home on the day her husband is marrying another woman.

title: Kitty Foyle
description: A hardworking white-collar girl from a middle-class family falls in love with a wealthy socialite, but their relationship faces scrutiny due to class differences.

title: The Westerner
description: A drifter is accused of horse stealing and faces the hangman, but manages to talk his way out of it by claiming he knows the judge's obsession, Lillie Langtry.

title: Waterloo Bridge
description: During World War I, a ballet dancer and an army officer meet on Waterloo Bridge during an air raid and fall in love, but the war threatens to tear them apart.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Elizabeth Bennet and her four sisters deal with the various aspects of love and marriage in a comedy of manners.

title: Boom Town
description: Two friends strike it rich in the oil fields, but their friendship is tested when they fall for the same woman.

title: Northwest Passage
description: Major Rogers leads his Rangers on a mission to destroy an Indian village in Canada, battling both the enemy and the harsh wilderness.

title: Strike Up the Band
description: A high school student dreams of becoming a famous drummer and orchestra leader, enlisting his talented friends to form a band.

title: They Drive by Night
description: Two brothers struggle to make ends meet as truck drivers, facing dangerous roads, sleepless nights, and corruption.

title: Remember the Night
description: A shoplifter and her prosecutor fall in love after he takes her home to spend Christmas with his family.

title: Christmas in July
description: An office clerk mistakenly believes he has won a coffee company slogan contest and goes on a spending spree.

title: The Long Voyage Home
description: The crew of a merchant ship in the early days of World War II faces danger, suspicion, and the trials of life at sea.

title: Knute Rockne All American
description: The biography of the legendary football coach of Notre Dame, Knute Rockne, and his impact on the game and his players.

title: Abe Lincoln in Illinois
description: The story of Abraham Lincoln's early years, from his days in New Salem to his election as President of the United States.

title: Road to Singapore
description: Two playboys try to forget their romantic troubles by fleeing to Singapore, where they meet a beautiful woman.

title: All This and Heaven Too
description: A French governess in 19th-century Paris falls in love with her employer, a Duke, leading to a scandal that rocks society.

title: Our Town
description: A portrayal of life in the small New Hampshire town of Grover's Corners, focusing on the romance between George Gibbs and Emily Webb.

title: Dark Command
description: A Texas cowboy becomes a marshal in Lawrence, Kansas, clashing with a schoolteacher who turns into a Confederate guerrilla leader.

title: Virginia City
description: A Union officer escapes a Confederate prison and heads to Nevada to stop a gold shipment intended to support the Southern war effort.

title: City for Conquest
description: A truck driver becomes a professional boxer to pay for his brother's music lessons, but his own eyesight is threatened.

title: Dance, Girl, Dance
description: An aspiring ballerina is forced to work in a burlesque show where she clashes with a brassy dancer.

title: The Mortal Storm
description: A German family is torn apart when the Nazis come to power, pitting father against son and friend against friend.

title: Strange Cargo
description: Convicts escaping from a Devil's Island penal colony are joined by a Christ-like figure who influences their spiritual redemption.

title: Brother Orchid
description: A gangster escapes an assassination attempt and hides out in a monastery, where he discovers a simpler way of life.

title: Torrid Zone
description: A banana plantation owner in South America juggles a revolutionary uprising, a scheming ex-employee, and a wisecracking cabaret singer.

title: Go West
description: The Marx Brothers head west to help the owner of a dead land deed find the money to pay off a loan.

title: I Love You Again
description: A boring businessman recovers from amnesia only to discover he is actually a con man, and falls in love with his wife all over again.

title: The Blue Bird
description: Two children seek the Blue Bird of Happiness in a magical dream world, in this Technicolor fantasy intended as a rival to The Wizard of Oz.
